items.title: Americans are getting flashbacks to 2008 as tariffs stoke recession fears
items.description: 'It's the old poors teaching the new poors,' said one content creator.

items.description: Investors look to some of the biggest companies for guidance on how the global trade could impact their bottom lines.

items.title: These U.S. consumer stocks face higher China risks, TD Cowen survey finds
items.description: U.S. brands are rapidly losing their appeal in China, especially as economic growth slows, according to a TD Cowen survey.

items.title: Amazon and Nvidia say all options are on the table to power AI including fossil fuels
items.description: The tech companies have invested mostly in renewable power, but they are now navigating a changed political environment.
